<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Check existence of keys"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/v2/pix/dict/key/check"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Queries the existence of a set of keys in the identifier directory.

All key types are valid for checking

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"title":"Root Type for PixDictKeysCheckRequest","description":"A list of Keys","required":["keys"],"type":"object","properties":{"keys":{"description":"A list of Addressing Keys","maximum":200,"minimum":1,"type":"array","items":{"title":"Root Type for PixDICTKey","description":"","required":["key"],"type":"object","properties":{"key":{"description":"Addressing Key","type":"string"}},"example":{"key":"+5561999999922"}}}},"example":{"keys":[{"key":"+5561999999922"},{"key":"jorge.silva@gmail.com"},{"key":"maria.silva@gmail.com"}]}}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
